mapper.select: select s.name as store_name ,c.member_id, c.item_id, c.quantity, i.category_id, i.name, i.stock ,i.price, i.detail, i.store_id , i.THUMB_FILE_URL from item i inner join cart c on c.item_id = i.id inner join store s on s.id = i.store_id where c.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_id, item_id, quantity) VALUES(#{member_id}, #{item_id}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: delete cart where member_id = #{member_id} and item_id = #{item_id}
